message: Bob, I'm willing to offer you this exclusive product for $2000000. I believe it will be a great investment for you. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your offer but $2000000 is beyond my budget for this product. I can offer $800000 for it. Let me know if that works for you.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. Given the value of the product, I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I'll offer it to you for $1600000. What do you say?
